title: help me pls!
body:
* **league of legends the older version of league of legends cannot be removed**
help me

replies.body: Our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) should help here!  There is an option for a clean reinstall that will make sure to remove everything seamlessly.  Let me know if that helps!
